channel.title: CiTR -- Queer FM QMUNITY
channel.description: QueerFM QMUNITY is a partnership between CiTR & QMUNITY to represent Queer Youth perspective from the GAB Youth Program. With analysis of LGTBQ+ current events, arts coverage and music, QueerFM QMUNITY gives Queer Youth a REAL voice on the air. Join us and get a different take.
channel.itunes:summary: QueerFM QMUNITY is a partnership between CiTR & QMUNITY to represent Queer Youth perspective from the GAB Youth Program. With analysis of LGTBQ+ current events, arts coverage and music, QueerFM QMUNITY gives Queer Youth a REAL voice on the air. Join us and get a different take.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Partnership between CiTR and QMUNITY

item.title: QueerFM QMUNITY : Politicspoluza
item.description:
QueerFM QMUNITY is BACK with a political BONANZA of US crazy politics...and a WTF feature rebuttal to the guys at Homorazzi.com - 'What ARE we fighting for?'
The QueerFM News team - Aedan Saint & Jennifer Breakspear...wade through the heavy, and make light of it ALL...
(but wait...there's more!)
Playlist in transit...coming soon!
Three shows, MANY Locations, ALL QueerFM - with PRIDE!
QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.
QueerFM broadcasts on CiTR 101.9FM Vancouver EVERY Sunday 6-8PM - with sister shows QueerFM QMUNITY from 5-6PM Sundays and QueerFM Arts Xtra at it's new weekly timeslot Tuesday mornings 9:30-10:30AM!
QueerFMVancouver.com
item.itunes:subtitle: (with Aedan Saint & Jennifer Breakspear)

item.title: QueerFM QMUNITY : QueerFM 2011 Rewind!
item.description:
QueerFM QMUNITY is BACK with out 2011 Wrap-up (gotta LOVE UBC Vacation hours) - and we count down our FAVE YouTube, music and generally weird FAVES...with a Queer Twist - and Chuck Norris!
(but wait...there's more!)

item.title: QueerFM QMUNITY : La Cage Queens!
item.description:
QueerFM QMUNITY is BACK and we've been overrun by the Queens of La Cage Aux Folles! In advance of Vancouver Playhouse's SPECIAL December 20th performance of La Cage Aux Folles benefiting QMUNITY - BC's Queer Resource Center! Join THE Samantha Mack and Empress XL Kamelle Toe for our totally FABULOUS edition of QueerFM QMUNITY!
As always - check out QMUNITY's MANY offerings for BC's LGBTQ community at Qmunity.ca!
Marianas Trench, Masterpiece Theatre 1 Marianas Trench, All to Myself Christmas Party Music, Winter Wonderlad (disco mix) Conversations With Queens Why Can't We Be Friends PSA Best Gay Pick Up Lines, youtube Love Is In The Air PSA Conversations With Queens Real Divas PSA RIO Dec 31 PSA Marianas Trench, Beside You Conversations With Queens, Talk Lube Thanks #2 Dec 31 PSA Ice To See You PSA
Three shows, MANY Locations, ALL QueerFM - with PRIDE!
QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.
QueerFM broadcasts on CiTR 101.9FM Vancouver EVERY Sunday 6-8PM - with sister shows QueerFM QMUNITY from 5-6PM Sundays and QueerFM Arts Xtra at it's new weekly timeslot Tuesday mornings 9:30-10:30AM!
QueerFMVancouver.com
item.itunes:subtitle: (with Samantha Mack & The Gurls of La Cage!)

item.title: QueerFM QMUNITY : Not Easy Being Green...
item.description:
QueerFM QMUNITY is BACK and it's all about being green. Check out Justin Saint's selections of music from the upcoming Muppet movie - and many other selections the entire LGBTQ community will enjoy! As always - check out QMUNITY's MANY offerings for BC's LGBTQ community at Qmunity.ca!

item.title: QueerFM QMUNITY : Vancouver Queer Film Festival & QMUNITY Broadcast Team News & Discussion
item.description:
QueerFM QMUNITY is back after OutGames madness and a WEEK of Vancouver Queer Film Festival goodness. Aedan, Justin & Vanessa talk about VQFF transgender movies! Neo, Clement, Justin & Aedan talk news and discuss marriage equality (for puppets as well), BBC Torchwood nudity...and Donald Trumps wind...and hair! (but wait...there's more!)

item.title: QueerFM : Fillmore Family Reunion Highlights AND Tyrell Witherspoon - singer, songerwriter, & 'The Dancing One' of Homorazzi!
item.description:
QueerFM is going DOWN HOME, Pard. Aedan Saint dons a cowboy hat and black leather (duh.) to cover THE Fillmore Family Reunion! Justin Saint gives away tickets to the upcoming Mama Mia North American Tour and...THE Tyrell Witherspoon sits down with the QueerFM QMUNITY Team to talk music, 'So You Think You Can Dance', finding his guy...and Homorazzi genesis.

item.title: QueerFM : LIVE from Vancouver PRIDE Festival!
item.description:
LIVE from the Beach - at Vancouver's 2011 PRIDE Festival! On today's broadcast: Samantha, Clement & Aedan talk PRIDE Float coolness with Mr. Dark, Aaron Harrison (formerly of Sin City).
Samantha and CBlaze...DISH on PRIDE.
Samantha & CBlaze talk with Aaron Morris of Morrismore Models on PRIDE Parade fun, challenges and modelling adventures.
Aedan & Justin Saint talk PRIDE memories, challenges and future with Ken Coolen, President of Vancouver PRIDE Society
Neo & CBlaze talk with 'Gay For A Day' organizers.
Justin Saint talks with Pamela Leeman, Transgender activist at Vancouver PRIDE Society BBQ
Justin Saint & Spencer talk with Jennifer Breakspear, Executive Director of QMUNITY on her start as an LGBTQ activist, ongoing LGBTQ programs...and 'Giving a Damn'.
All this and MORE from Vancouver's PRIDE Festival
Eight Days, MANY Locations, ALL OUTGAMES - with PRIDE! QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.
QueerFM broadcasts on CiTR 101.9FM Vancouver EVERY Sunday 6-8PM - with sister shows QueerFM QMUNITY from 5-6PM Sundays and QueerFM Arts Xtra at it's new weekly timeslot Tuesday mornings 9:30-10:30AM!

item.title: QueerFM : OutGames Closing Ceremonies from Plaza of Nations!
item.description:
Another day and night of OutGames sports, human rights conference and activities complete...and CiTR is there with the wrap-up! On tonight's broadcast: Aedan Saint speaks with John Boychuk, OutGames Organizer about his thoughts on the OutGames overall.
Mr. CBlaze talks with the CAST of Homorazzi.com and ALL their ongoing adventures during OutGames, PRIDE and beyond!
Justin Saint & Vanessa talk with Calan Brecken of the Diversity Project - fantastic outreach to LGBTQ Youth in BC.
Leroy interviews Dragonette backstage!
We close out with Barb Snelgrove, organizer, activist and LGBTQ pundit for her final thoughts on the OutGames!
Eight Days, MANY Locations, ALL OUTGAMES - with PRIDE! QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.
QueerFM broadcasts on CiTR 101.9FM Vancouver EVERY Sunday 6-8PM - with sister shows QueerFM QMUNITY from 5-6PM Sundays and QueerFM Arts Xtra at it's new weekly timeslot Tuesday mornings 9:30-10:30AM!
item.itunes:subtitle: (with Samantha Mack, Clement CBlaze, Spencer, Vanessa, Leroy, Justin Saint & Aedan Saint)

item.title: QueerFM : OutGames Wrap-up from QMUNITY!
item.description:
Another day and night of OutGames sports, human rights conference and activities completed...and CiTR is here to wrap up the day - hosted by QMUNITY and featuring hosts from QueerFM QMUNITY! On tonight's broadcast: Mr. CBlaze presents clips from CiTR Sports Team with Wilson Wong.
Samantha Mack, Neo, Jazmine & Calvin talk OutGames Human Rights Conference...the foreskin controversy, 'genderless' children...and much more.
Jennifer Breakspear, Executive Director of QMUNITY drops by to explain 'Give A Damn, Give a DAY'...and why we SHOULD (and DO!)
David Holtzman of Vancouver's Out on Screen talks Youth Programs, the impact of film and youth programs for the LGBTQ community. Get involved...or just enjoy the films...
Tim Van Horne of CanadianMosaic.ca comes OUT from his tent...and talks about his amazing photo project documenting the diversity of Canada AND his other project PrideMosaic.ca!
We ALL share our brief 'coming out' stories...and the differences between generations.
All this and more from QMUNITY - Vancouver's BC's Queer Resource Center!
Eight Days, MANY Locations, ALL OUTGAMES - with PRIDE! QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.
QueerFM broadcasts on CiTR 101.9FM Vancouver EVERY Sunday 6-8PM - with sister shows QueerFM QMUNITY from 5-6PM Sundays and QueerFM Arts Xtra at it's new weekly timeslot Tuesday mornings 9:30-10:30AM!
item.itunes:subtitle: (with Samantha Mack, Clement CBlaze, Neo, Calvin, Jazmine, & Aedan Saint)

item.title: QueerFM : OutGames Wrap-up from Celebrities Nightclub
item.description:
Yet another day and night of OutGames sports, human rights conference and activities completed...and CiTR has the wrap-up! On tonight's broadcast: Mr. CBlaze and Aedan Saint present clips from CiTR Sports Team with Wilson Wong.
Josh Rimer's 'Stereotypical Gay' is in the kitchen and COOKING!
Kamelle Toe - Empress XL of Vancouver, Mother Court of Canada in the International Court System - comes on the program to talk about her year, giving back to the LGBTQ Community, advice for new drag performers and how THEY make a difference - and she takes the 'Gay Hearts Weep' Challenge!
All this and more from Celebrities Nightclub and one of the LARGEST Gay Bingo Nights in Canada - as we broadcast OutGames greatness.
Eight Days, Eight Locations, ALL OUTGAMES - with PRIDE! QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.
QueerFM broadcasts on CiTR 101.9FM Vancouver EVERY Sunday 6-8PM - with sister shows QueerFM QMUNITY from 5-6PM Sundays and QueerFM Arts Xtra at it's new weekly timeslot Tuesday mornings 9:30-10:30AM!

item.title: QueerFM : OutGames Wrap-up from the Junction Pub
item.description:
Another day and night of OutGames sports, human rights conference and activities complete...and CiTR is there with the wrap-up! On tonight's broadcast: Mr. CBlaze and Aedan Saint present clips from human rights conference on Marriage Equality as well as QueerFM commentary on NY Marriage benefits...and Texas/Utah's stance.
We also speak with surprise guest, Vancouver's Bif Naked on work, life, balance, cancer, marriage invitation etiquette for gays & lesbians...and funny voices.
Glen Callendar from the Foreskin Awareness Project drops in for a chat about his International outreach, facts about circumcision, upcoming OutGames appearance...and Straight/Bi/Gay Men weep. We round out our coverage with
David Holtzman of Out On Screen - Vancouver's Film Festival known for diversity and fantastic selection. Whew. Those two hours went by FAST!!
Eight Days, Eight Locations, ALL OUTGAMES - with PRIDE! QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.
QueerFM broadcasts on CiTR 101.9FM Vancouver EVERY Sunday 6-8PM - with sister shows QueerFM QMUNITY from 5-6PM Sundays and QueerFM Arts Xtra at it's new weekly timeslot Tuesday mornings 9:30-10:30AM!

item.title: QueerFM : OutGames Grouse Grind 6K Challenge
item.description:
It's a 6K run...up a 4400 foot elevation to a mountain peak. It's grueling, daunting for even the most conditioned athlete, and a Vancouver right of passage for endurance athletes...and CiTR is there to cover the winners at the finish line with music and interviews.
Join broadcasters Aedan Saint, David Levitt and Jessi King as we interview the winners and talk about the event...while broadcasting inside the clouds!
Eight Days, Eight Locations, ALL OUTGAMES - with PRIDE! QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.
QueerFM broadcasts on CiTR 101.9FM Vancouver EVERY Sunday 6-8PM - with sister shows QueerFM QMUNITY from 5-6PM Sundays and QueerFM Arts Xtra at it's new weekly timeslot Tuesday mornings 9:30-10:30AM!

item.title: QueerFM : OutGames Wrap-up from Club 560
item.description:
It's the FIRST Day of CiTR's OUTGAMES Broadcasts with music from C.Blaze, interviews with Sugarbeach, excerpts from Mayor of Vancouver Gregor Robertson, Joan-E and dignitaries from the OutGames OFFICIAL opening from City Hall, Destineak drops by for a quick word, summary of Soccer playoffs, Where in PRIDE is Mr. C.Blaze, and OutGames Flag Runner Ceremony! LIVE on location from the OutGames Official Launch Party at Club 560 in Downtown Vancouver!
Eight Days, Eight Locations, ALL OUTGAMES - with PRIDE! QueerFM. We're not sorry. You're welcome.

item.title: QueerFM : OutGames Soccer Tournament - San Diego vs San Franscisco - Boston vs Japan
item.description:
Excerpts of two GREAT games from the 2011 North American OutGames Sporting Events on CiTR! On this broadcast:
OutGames Soccer Tournament with San Diego vs San Francisco Spikes then to Boston vs Japan!
Join Wilson Wong and the CiTR/QueerFM Sports Team - as we BRING IT!

item.title: QueerFM : OutGames & PRIDE Week Preview
item.description:
It's an action packed KICK OFF of CiTR's OUTGAMES Broadcasts with music, interviews with WESA Softball champ Fountainhead Pub Team Vancouver, Barb Snelgrove & John Boychuk from 2011 North American OutGames, Vancouver activist & entrepreneur Derek White, Pinoy PRIDE Vancouver,QMUNITY's GAB Program, Samantha & C.Blaze get social and much MUCH more! LIVE on location from the Fountainhead Pub in Vancouver's beautiful Davie Village...
